value:
Reinforcements can receive the
stat bonuses from Mythic Effects,
even if they are a Mythic Hero.

If the reinforcement is a Mythic
Hero, they do not receive the stat
bonus of their own Mythic Effect,
nor do they grant it to their allies.

Reinforcements can receive the
stat bonuses from Mythic Effects,
even if they are a Mythic Hero.

If the reinforcement is a Mythic
Hero, they do not receive the stat
bonus of their own Mythic Effect,
nor do they grant it to their allies.

$aIn setup $a0, if no Heroes remain on
your Defensive Team outside of your
reinforcement slot, level 40 Alfonse,
Sharena, and Anna will defend, and
the reinforcement Hero will appear.

$aThe Defensive Team in setup $a0
does not include a Mythic Hero who
can activate the reinforcement slot, so
the reinforcement slot is inactive.
$aA Calling Circle (D) has been placed\nin setup $a0, but no Hero is in your\nDefensive Team's reinforcement slot.

$aA Calling Circle (D), which enables
the Hero in your Defensive Team's
reinforcement slot in setup $a0 to
appear, has not been placed.

$aThe Hero in the reinforcement slot
for defensive team setup $a0 does
not fulfill either of the conditions
below, so the slot will not activate:
・ Seasonal Legendary Heroes
・ Dark/Anima seasonal Mythic
Heroes and blessed Heroes
